column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have been to Ba Ba Reeba a few times before and it was good
column2: but not as authentic as I would have liked. Personally
column3: I vote Cafe Iberico as most authentic. Some of the dishes at BBR had a Spanish influence
column4: while others did not (ie. beef medallions with potato chips?? sounds more American to me). As a whole
column5: I guess I just didn't think it was all that special. But don't listen to me
column6: because apparently I'm the only one who feels that way as there are mobs of people waiting to eat here...
